      • Place

        public Place(java.lang.String name,
             DepartmentPlace department,
             double squarekilometers,
             TypePlace type,
             java.lang.String photo,
             double economicResourcesNeeded,
             Community community,
             java.util.Calendar inaugurationDate)
        Description: This method is the constructor of Place
        Parameters:
        name - String, the name of the place
        department - DepartmentPlace, the department of the place
        squarekilometers - double, the square kilometers of the plces
        type - int, the option of the type of the place
        photo - String, the internet direction of the photo of the place
        economicResourcesNeeded - double, the economic resources that the place need to be preserved
        community - Community, the community object that takes care of the place
        inaugurationDate - Calendar, the inauguration date of the place
